articles.title: European Space Agency Shares Incredible Image Of Cone Nebula In Deep Space - NDTV
articles.description: The photo of the nebula was clicked by the ESO's Very Large Telescope to celebrate its 60th anniversary.
articles.content:
The cone nebula has a lighthouse-like shape.
A stunning image of a cone nebula in deep space has left the astronomers in shock. The image shows a strange figure in the vast universe that appears to … [+1413 chars]
